scripts.build: go run github.com/syumai/workers/cmd/workers-assets-gen -mode=go && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o ./build/app.wasm .
scripts.dev:assets: wrangler r2 object put ujiprog-static/index.html --file=index.html --local && wrangler r2 object put ujiprog-static/avator.jpg --file=public/avator.jpg --local && wrangler r2 object put ujiprog-static/favicon.ico --file=public/favicon.ico --local && wrangler r2 object put ujiprog-static/articles.json --file=public/articles.json --local && for f in build/articles/*; do [ -f "$f" ] && wrangler r2 object put "ujiprog-static/articles/$(basename $f)" --file="$f" --local; done
